acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms

service_overview.title: 2. Service Overview
service_overview.body: E & D provides a real-time listing and search interface for physical clothing shop inventories. We do not sell or ship products ourselves; instead, we connect customers with verified shop owners via features such as search, maps, and category filters.

items.age: You must be at least 18 years old to register.
items.security: Registration requires a valid email. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password.
items.notify: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use or security breach.

payments.title: 4. Subscription & Payments
payments.body: Shop owners subscribe via our sandbox payment system at Become Owner for a recurring fee of $20/month. Payments are handled through Stripe. Subscriptions renew automatically until canceled. You may cancel anytime via the Settings dashboard under Delete Business. No refunds for partial periods.

owner_dashboard.title: 5. Owner Dashboard
owner_dashboard.intro: Once subscribed, owners access the Settings dashboard to manage:

products.label: Products:
products.desc: Add/edit/delete items with up to 10 images each.

photos.label: Photos:
photos.desc: Upload cover images and logos (via Google Cloud Storage).

employees.label: Employees:
employees.desc: Promote users to employees who can propose changes.

reservations.label: Reservations:
reservations.desc: View and manage customer reservation requests.

notifications.label: Notifications:
notifications.desc: Review all system notifications and alerts.

items.lawful: Use the platform lawfully and respectfully.
items.accuracy: Ensure accuracy of all information you submit.
items.impersonation: Do not impersonate others or misuse any feature.
